input.sentences: we took the kids out to enjoy the holidays
first the got to eat some fruits .
then we took them to the park to play
after they got to show off their clovers
it was a great day with the kids .
output.sentences: The kids were all excited about the holiday today, it was one of the ones they enjoyed most!
They got to pick out fruits from a basket for a healthy treat to eat!
After the treat they all went into the park to play on this holiday.
Play time is over kids, now it's time to get your clovers!
At the end of the day the kids got ready to go home and end their holiday.
